mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.form_state , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.scrap_reason , t1.remarks from assets_furniture_scrap_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.PROC_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procName}),'%')
and t1.PROC_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.procId}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
and t1.SCRAP_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapReason}),'%')
and t1.REMARKS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.remarks}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.form_state , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.scrap_reason , t1.remarks from assets_furniture_scrap_proc t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
or t1.ID =#{bean.id}
or t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
or t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')

or t1.CREATED_BY_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPerson}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
or t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
or t1.SCRAP_REASON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.scrapReason}),'%')
or t1.REMARKS like concat(concat('%',#{bean.remarks}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.proc_name , t1.proc_id , t1.form_state , t1.created_by_person , t1.created_by_dept , t1.created_by_tel , t1.scrap_reason , t1.remarks from assets_furniture_scrap_proc t1 where t1.id = #{id}

insert into assets_furniture_scrap_proc( id, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, last_update_ip, version, proc_name, proc_id, form_state, created_by_person, created_by_dept, created_by_tel, scrap_reason, remarks)
select #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.creationDate}, #{item.lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.lastUpdateDate}, #{item.lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.update:
update assets_furniture_scrap_proc
id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creation_date =#{creationDate},
last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate},
last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version =version+1,
proc_name =#{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proc_id =#{procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
form_state =#{formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by_person =#{createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by_dept =#{createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by_tel =#{createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scrap_reason =#{scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks =#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id} and version =#{version}

update assets_furniture_scrap_proc set id =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by =#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creation_date =#{creationDate}, last_updated_by =#{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_date =#{lastUpdateDate}, last_update_ip =#{lastUpdateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version =version+1, proc_name =#{procName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_id =#{procId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, form_state =#{formState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_person =#{createdByPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_dept =#{createdByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by_tel =#{createdByTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scrap_reason =#{scrapReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks =#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id} and version =#{version}
